search:searchType.search:name: Related Org Quick View by Relation Type
search:searchType.search:desc: Finding child orgs, given the parent relation type

search:searchType.search:name: Org Quick View by Relation Type, Org Type and Related Org Ids
search:searchType.search:desc: Finding parent orgs, given the child org ids, parent relation type and parent org type

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: OrgByRelationTypeOrgTypeRelatedOrgIds
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: child org ids, parent relation type and parent org type

search:searchType.search:name: Generic search for organizations
search:searchType.search:desc: Query with multiple optional elements to satisfy most advanced pickers

search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:name: Organization Full View Less Hierarchies
search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:desc: Full view of the Organization Less Hierarchies

search:resultColumn.search:name: Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Long name for the organization, recorded as the default listing.

search:searchType.search:name: All Orgs Filtered
search:searchType.search:desc: Query with multiple optional elements

search:searchType.search:name: All org Hierarchies
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns all org hierarchy ids.

search:searchType.search:name: All org Types
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns all org types.

search:searchType.search:name: All org Types
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns all org types.

search:searchType.search:name: All org Hierarchies
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns all org hierarchy ids.

search:searchType.search:name: All org Hierarchies
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns all org hierarchy ids.

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Org Type
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a quick view of organization information for orgs having a match on org type.

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Hierarchy and ShortName match
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a quick view of organization information for orgs in a hierarchy with like on shortName.

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Relation Type, Org Type and RelatedOrg type
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a quick view of organization information for orgs in a relation with specified types

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Relation Type, Org Type and RelatedOrg type
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a quick view of organization information for orgs in a relation with specified types

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Relation Type, Org Type and Org name
search:searchType.search:desc: Full view of organization information for orgs in a relation with specified types

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Relation Type, Org Type or Org name
search:searchType.search:desc: Full view of organization information for orgs in a relation with specified types

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Relation Type, Org Ide and RelatedOrg type
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a quick view of organization information for orgs in a relation with and org and specified types

search:searchType.search:name: ShortName match
search:searchType.search:desc: Search on shortName only.

search:searchType.search:name: ShortName and Type match
search:searchType.search:desc: Search on shortName and Type.

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View by First Letter of Short Name or Long Name
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a quick view of organization information for orgs whose short or long name start with a particular letter

search:searchType.search:name: Full view by organization id key
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a full view of organization information for the id supplied

search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:name: Hierarchies Containing an Org
search:searchResultTypeInfo.search:desc: IDs of hierarchies that a specified org is a member of

search:resultColumn.search:name: Organization Short Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Short name for the organization, recorded as the default listing.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Organization Long Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Long name for the organization, recorded as the default listing.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Organization Hierarchy Name
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Name for the Hierarchy an Organization is in.

search:resultColumn.search:name: Organization Hierarchy Id
search:resultColumn.search:desc: Id for the Hierarchy an Organization is in.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a Canonical Learning Unit (CLU).

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: CLU Identifier
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a Canonical Learning Unit (CLU).

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: findOrgPositionRestrictionsCriteria
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Org ID on which to search for Positions

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: HierarchiesOrgIsInCriteria
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Org ID on which to search for containing hierarchies

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: OrgByRelationTypeOrgTypeRelatedOrgType
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Orgs in a relation with the given org type and related org type

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: OrgByRelationTypeOrgTypeRelatedOrgType
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Orgs in a relation with the given org type and related org type

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: OrgByRelationTypeOrgTypeOrgName
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Orgs in a relation with the given org type and org name

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: OrgByRelationTypeOrgType
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Orgs in a relation with the given org type

search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:name: OrgQuickViewByRelationTypeRelatedOrgTypeOrgId
search:searchCriteriaTypeInfo.search:desc: Orgs in a relation with the given orgid, type and related org name

search:searchType.search:name: Organization Quick View By Org Type
search:searchType.search:desc: Returns a quick view of organization information for orgs having a match on org type.

entry.value: SELECT oh.id, oh.name FROM OrgHierarchy oh
SELECT org.id, org.name FROM OrgType org
SELECT org.id, org.name FROM OrgPersonRelationType org
SELECT opr.personRelationType.id , opr.title FROM OrgPositionRestriction opr WHERE opr.org.id = :org_queryParam_orgId
SELECT hierarchy.id FROM Org org, in(org.type.orgHierarchies) hierarchy WHERE org.id = :org_queryParam_orgId
SELECT org.id, org.shortName FROM Org org WHERE org.type.id = :org_queryParam_orgType
SELECT org.id, org.shortName FROM Org org, in(org.type.orgHierarchies) hierarcy WHERE org.shortName like :org_queryParam_orgShortName and hierarcy.id = :org_queryParam_orgHierarchyId

SELECT org.id, org.longName, org.type.id, hierarchy.name FROM Org org, in(org.type.orgHierarchies) hierarchy WHERE org.shortName like :org_queryParam_orgShortName or org.longName like :org_queryParam_orgShortName
SELECT org.id, org.shortName FROM Org org WHERE org.shortName like :org_queryParam_orgShortName or org.id = :org_queryParam_orgId
SELECT org.id, org.shortName FROM Org org WHERE org.type.id = :org_queryParam_orgType AND (org.shortName like :org_queryParam_orgShortName or org.id = :org_queryParam_orgId)
SELECT org.id, org.shortName, org.longName, org.type.id, hierarchy.name FROM Org org, in(org.type.orgHierarchies) hierarchy WHERE org.id = :org_queryParam_orgId

SELECT rel.relatedOrg.id, rel.relatedOrg.shortName, rel.relatedOrg.longName FROM OrgOrgRelation rel WHERE rel.type.id = :org_queryParam_relationType AND rel.org.type.id = :org_queryParam_orgType AND rel.relatedOrg.type.id = :org_queryParam_relatedOrgType ORDER BY rel.relatedOrg.shortName ASC

SELECT rel.relatedOrg.id, rel.relatedOrg.shortName FROM OrgOrgRelation rel WHERE rel.type.id = :org_queryParam_relationType AND rel.org.id = :org_queryParam_orgId AND rel.relatedOrg.type.id = :org_queryParam_relatedOrgType

SELECT rel.org.id, rel.org.shortName FROM OrgOrgRelation rel WHERE rel.type.id = :org_queryParam_relationType AND (rel.org.type.id in (:org_queryParam_orgTypeList)) AND rel.relatedOrg.type.id = :org_queryParam_relatedOrgType ORDER BY rel.org.shortName ASC
SELECT DISTINCT rel.org.id, rel.org.shortName, rel.org.longName, rel.org.type.id FROM OrgOrgRelation rel, OrgOrgRelation rel2
rel.org.type.id IN (:org_queryParam_optionalOrgTypeList)

(rel.relatedOrg.id IN (:org_queryParam_relatedOrgIds) OR (rel.relatedOrg.id NOT IN (:org_queryParam_relatedOrgIds) AND rel2.relatedOrg.id IN (:org_queryParam_relatedOrgIds) AND rel.relatedOrg.id = rel2.org.id))
rel.org.id = :org_queryParam_relOrgOptionalId
rel.type.id = :org_queryParam_optionalRelationType AND rel2.type.id = :org_queryParam_optionalRelationType
rel.type.id = :org_queryParam_optionalOrgRelationType
SELECT DISTINCT rel.relatedOrg.id, rel.relatedOrg.shortName, rel.relatedOrg.longName, rel.relatedOrg.type.id FROM OrgOrgRelation rel
SELECT DISTINCT rel.org.id, rel.org.shortName, rel.org.longName, rel.org.type.id FROM OrgOrgRelation rel
SELECT DISTINCT rel.org.id, rel.org.shortName, rel.org.longName, rel.org.type.id FROM OrgOrgRelation rel
rel.org.longName
rel.org.shortName
SELECT org.id, org.shortName, org.longName, org.type.id, hierarchy.name FROM Org org, in(org.type.orgHierarchies) hierarchy
SELECT org.id, org.shortName, org.longName, org.type.id FROM Org org
org.type.id = :org_queryParam_orgGenericType
org.shortName like :org_queryParam_orgGenericShortName
org.id = :org_queryParam_orgOptionalId
org.id IN (:org_queryParam_orgOptionalIds)
org.org.id = :org_queryParam_orgPositionId
org.type.id IN (:org_queryParam_orgOptionalType)
org.shortName
org.shortName like :org_queryParam_startswith_orgOptionalShortName || '%' OR org.shortName like '% ' || :org_queryParam_startswith_orgOptionalShortName || '%'
org.longName
org.longName
SELECT org.id, org.shortName, org.longName FROM Org org WHERE org.type.id = :org_queryParam_orgType
NATIVE: SELECT org.SHRT_NAME, org.SHRT_DESCR from KSOR_ORG org where org.TYPE ='kuali.org.SubjectCode'
